scripts.build:linux: tauri build --bundles deb,appimage && node scripts/collect-release-artifacts.mjs linux
scripts.build:macos: tauri build --bundles app,dmg && node scripts/collect-release-artifacts.mjs macos
scripts.build:windows: tauri build --bundles msi,nsis && node scripts/collect-release-artifacts.mjs windows
scripts.build:all: bun run build:linux && bun run build:macos && bun run build:windows && node scripts/collect-release-artifacts.mjs all
